title: Astro 5.2 Brings Tailwind 4 Support and New Features
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Also this week in dev news: A server-driven UI app framework for Flutter, Android 16, and Vercel acquires open source library Tremor.
cntitle: Astro 5.2 带来了 Tailwind 4 支持和新功能
cndescription: 本周开发者新闻：一个用于 Flutter 的服务器驱动 UI 应用程序框架、Android 16，以及 Vercel 收购了开源库 Tremor。
